Issue.creator: kchristidis
Issue.summary: Skip processing if received message cannot be unmarshaled
Issue.description: Even though that path (error in unmarshaling + type switch) was activated in the tests without issues, there is (might be? it's up to the `proto` package) a non-zero chance we can end up with a non-nil error and a nil message, which will result in a nil panic dereference. A `continue` statement prevents this from happening.
